column2: I ordered the Tuscan kale salad ("kale with golden raisins
column6: lemon grass vinaigrette"). Both were excellent. Out of the two
column7: the Tuscan kale was my favorite. The golden raisins provided a caramel-like sweetness and the Parmesan cheese added an addictive savory element that kept me attacking it throughout the whole meal. It was really nice in between the bites of Banh mi.
